description: This file defines the StringUtils object that provides utility functions for string manipulation, specifically join and split operations, which internally utilize other utility classes.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A singleton object providing string manipulation utilities.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Converts a LinkedList into a String using JoinUtils.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a String into a LinkedList using SplitUtils.
